sentences.english: But many people think Blu-ray has won the competition with HD DVD.
sentences.chinese: 但多數人認爲藍光影碟機在競爭中勝過了高清影碟機。

sentences.english: But many people think Blu-ray has won the competition with HD DVD.
sentences.chinese: 但多數人認爲藍光影碟機在競爭中勝過了高清影碟機。

sentences.english: Father bought a Wanlida video disk player from the shop.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸從商場買回了一臺萬利達牌的影碟機。

sentences.english: Your tape recorder is out of control.
sentences.chinese: 影碟機你的錄音機壞了。

sentences.english: The Toshiba company is the main supplier of the players.
sentences.chinese: 東芝公司是此類影碟機的主要供應商。
